name: ❄️⚡️WhiteLightning(RARE) | G19
bio: Yo! I'm ❄️⚡️WhiteLightning(RARE) | G19. I want to live in a world where people believe the world is flat. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their oversized sweaters and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. I can't wait to wake you up at 4am for seemingly no reason.
